dwithwa shathakalabhi nayaka mushfikar rahim ha mohamad ashrafulge warthagatha kadulu sabandathawa matha bangladeshaya owunge wadima test mulu lakunu sankhyawa wartha kirimen pasuwa palamu test tharagaye eeye siwuwani dinaya awasan wana wita shri lankawa kadulu 9k athathiwa lakunu 48kin peramunata piwisa sitiyeya.galla jathyanthara krikat kridanganaye pawathwena me tharagayedi bangladeshaya palamu inimedi lakunu 638k laba gaththeya.eeye tharagaya nathara karana wita shri lankawa siya dewani inime ek kadullak dawi lakunu 116k raskara gena sitiyeya.aarambhaka pithikaru thilakarathna dilshan hathare pahara 4k ella karamin pandu 87kin lakunu 63kda, kumar sangakkara hathare pahara 6k samaga pandu 78kin lakunu 49kda laba gena nodawi sitiyaha.me pithikaru yugalaya palamu kadulla wenuwen lakunu 99ka nobindi sabandathawak godanaga gena sitiyaha.

yuddhaye awasana bhagayedi sidu wu bawa pawasena yuda aparadha chodana pilibandawa wibhaga kirima pinisa 2013 di makswal paranagama komisama pathkarana ladde ewaka janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha wisin.

karandana dewarakkhitha nahimiyanata rajya anugrahayalaba dimata me kadima awasthawakyayi salaku morathota dhammakanda sthiwarayan wahanse,siya mithra sthiwarapadayanata me pilibada wisthara danwa lipiyak ewuha.ehi sandahan karunu piligath dewarakkhitha swaminwahanse alankara ath akurin majjima nikaya (madum sangiya )pus kolaye liya usas bana pothak sampadanaya kota mahanuwara maha wasalata pirinamuha.ee dakimen mahath se prasadayata path shri wikrama rajasinha rajathuma ,dewarakkhitha himiyanta kawara andamin ee prasadaya pala karanne da yi wimasa sitiyeya.rajuta awashya wuye me yathiwarayananta kisiyam parithyagayak kirimaya.ee awasthawe dewarakkhitha himiyan kiya sitiye "miyana dalu tikak kada ganimata idam kaballak pramanawath"bawaya.kalu nadiya asabada diya sirawa athi idamwala miyana shaka bahulawa wawe.kirialle pansala aasannayeda e wani bimpawathina.dewarakkhitha himiyange illimata ekaga wu raju unwahansege awashyathawa itu kirima sadaha katayuthu sampadanaya kaleya.ewaka mehi paripalanaya bharawa siti rajakaruna senewirathna wasala abhayakon mudiyanse ralahamige athsanin dewarakkhitha himiyan wetha sannasak nikuth karini.angal 12k diga angal1 1/2 k palala kara kolayaka (la thal kolaya)liyana lada me sannasata piththalenramuwak yoda thibe.peli 8bagin depitehima akshara liya thibe.mema sannasehi sandahan wa athi mayimwalin watawu bhumi pramanaya akkara 8305ki.miyana kola tikak kadaganimata pradanaya karanu idam kaballe tharama!meya unwahanseta rajugen labunu nindagamaki.mema pradanaya sidu kara aththe shaka warsha 1723 (ra:wa :1801)nawam masa pura ekoloswaka nam thithiyalath sandu dinaya.
ema puwath path wala watina lipi kiyawana sama patakayekutama ema lipi athara athi danwim asa gasima walakwiya nohakiya.
